doc/go1.1.html:716: interface.  The new functions
i'm trying to use one space after periods, breaking a lifelong habit, but the
simpler approach for HTML is to start each sentence on a new line. isn't documentation fun? aren't fusspots annoying?

https://codereview.appspot.com/7725048/diff/5001/doc/go1.1.html File doc/go1.1.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7725048/diff/5001/doc/go1.1.html#newcode713 doc/go1.1.html:713: options. Each option is represented by a new s/to dial with zero or more options/to supply options to Dial.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
